mapper.insert: insert into hall(hallname, type, hall_row, hall_column) values (#{hallname},#{type},#{hallRow},#{hallColumn});
mapper.select: select hall_id as hallID,hallname,type,hall_row as hallRow,hall_column as hallColumn,status from hall where hall_id=#{hallID};
